name: Escaping
description:
Plot

A game made for Ludum Dare 46 with the theme Keep It Alive!

Your partner was seriously injured after robbing a jewellery, then, you  managed to take  control of the ambulance!

Keep your partner alive while you avoid cars ahead and  blow the cops chasing after You!

Controls:

  • A & D switch lanes
  • E to Switch between driving and shooting
  • Mouse to Aim &  LMB to shoot;
  • Q pauses the game
Team & Roles:
  • Elvis Leite - Programmer (Gameplay, AI, Tweening Animations);
  • Ivan Garcia - Programmer (Physics, VFX, SFX);
  • Ivan Santos - Artist (3D, Animation);
